backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister exposing a testDeployment method that always traps with an informational message.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI rename, SEO metadata updates, and logo replacement tasks to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for all major frontend components, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and design tokens defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with updated SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata plus links to new logo and favicon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the TrainingCenterPage.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form with inline errors, simulated submission, and success banner handling.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable layout section wrapper with optional title and consistent spacing.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/SuccessBanner.ts: Alert banner indicating successful message submission.
frontend/src/components/TrainingCenterPa: Full training center page including hero, courses, gallery, contact form, and success message state logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and loading persisted identities. Implements AuthClient creation and exposes status flags and identity through a custom hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and typography styles. Applies global element styling for layout, text, and headings.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge to avoid conflicting Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Imports global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended theme options, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and image update instructions for building a training center website per the provided poster.
